name: Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands (Premium Edition)
description: Support Iris and Robin and help them to win the Magical Tournament in "Magic Farm 2: Fairy Lands"! With help from new and old friends, new improvements to the farm, and unique upgrades, this Time Management game will have you occupied for hours!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/ME/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 1.0GHz CPU Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: 128MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.2GHz CPU Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
